title: free memory drop down from 10G to 400M and system killed the training eventually
body:
Hi,

I test the master branch[599c2db merge request 456] with http://data.keithito.com/data/speech/LJSpeech-1.1.tar.bz2
my environment:
ubuntu 1804
python 3.7.5 virtual env
memory 16G

1. follow the guide as https://gist.github.com/erogol/97516ad65b44dbddb8cd694953187c5b
    wget http://data.keithito.com/data/speech/LJSpeech-1.1.tar.bz2
   tar -xjf LJSpeech-1.1.tar.bz2
   shuf LJSpeech-1.1/metadata.csv > LJSpeech-1.1/metadata_shuf.csv
   head -n 12000 LJSpeech-1.1/metadata_shuf.csv > LJSpeech-1.1/metadata_train.csv
   tail -n 1100 LJSpeech-1.1/metadata_shuf.csv > LJSpeech-1.1/metadata_val.csv
   git clone https://github.com/mozilla/TTS
   sudo apt-get install espeak
   pip install soundfile
   cd TTS
   python setup.py install
----use following code to generate local config.json-----
   import json
   from utils.io import load_config
   CONFIG = load_config('config.json')
   CONFIG['datasets'][0]['path'] = '../LJSpeech-1.1/'
   CONFIG['output_path'] = '../'
   with open('config.json', 'w') as fp:
       json.dump(CONFIG, fp)
-----code end------------
2.  run python train.py --config_path config.json,
3. open top in new terminal, you will find the free memory drop down quickly when free memory reaches several hundreds MB,
    the train was killed by system.

Thanks for your investigation~
